page.title: 06LOCAL WATCH SCHEME
page.content: A few weeks ago a policeman came to our house giving us a form asking if we wanted to be part of the Local Watch Scheme. 440 houses were asked and l45 said they were interested. The survey included Crown St. Burmer Rd.Thistlemoor Road & Scotney St.They also asked if we wanted free advice on locks and alarms. My "Nan" who lives in Scotney St. said that she did. I was present when they came. They showed us many different locks and alarms.My Nan chose an alarm which you put on the bottom of the door.When you go out you press a lever and lock the door as normal. When a burglar comes, if he pushes on the door, then a soft alarm goes off to warn the burglar. Then if he keeps pushing on the door, the alarm gets louder and wakes you up.
